channel.title: Pi client problem
channel.description:
Hello guys, so when ever i add custom item ( torva, as i was adding it, well trying), i have pasted models in raw folder in cache, pasted code in itemdef.java (client dont have itemdef2.java) compiled and i had no errors. then i run client and i get this
http://i46.tinypic.com/2r6nzt2.png
but when i delete the models and run the client again, everything works
can some1 help me? is it because my client dont read models over 55k or something? i got models in raw file which goes to 51800 (staff of light) and it read it i really need help thanks
